name: Imperium Galactica II
description: Reintroducing a classic from the golden era of gaming, the original empire building space RTS, Imperium Galactica 2 is back and looking better than ever with new high-res textures and vivid colors.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10 (32 or 64bit) Processor: Intel 1.4 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible gpu Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
